title: Drawing, "Color in Men's Clothes", mid-20th century
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper
description: Design for cover. Two triangles. Left one with women in black dresses seen to bust. Right one, men in variegated coats, ties, etc.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Color in Men's Clothes", mid-20th century.
mid-20th century. Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-16.
